name: 17-GlimmerHMM
description: Gene finder based on a Generalized Hidden Markov Model (GHMM)

parameters.name: Protein domain searches
parameters.description: If protein domain searches are available, read them from file file_name

parameters.name: Training directory
parameters.description: Training directory is specified by dir_name (introduced for compatibility with earlier versions)

parameters.name: Print output
parameters.description: Print output in file_name; if n>1 for top best predictions, output is in file_name.1, file_name.2, ... , file_name.n

parameters.name: Not svm
parameters.description: Don't use svm splice site predictions

parameters.name: Help
parameters.description: Display the options of the program
